Description: Fragment of round handle at shoulder join of an Apulian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine pink-brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Gorgias. Known from the Apani site, P. Palazzo, Le anfore di Apani (Brindisi), Rome 2013, 117, type A1; slave of Vehilius (Desy, Ph., Les timbres amphoriques de l'Apulie republicaine (Oxford 1989) 175).
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (335)
